评论详情: These are so soft and comfortable! Still looking and fitting great after several washes. Lightweight, lots of color options, and easy to wear.

I never do reviews but these tops are worth writing about.  I searched for a long time for the perfect fit and length.  These are amazing.  Not too short , not too long. They flow beautifully and are loose in the arm pits to allow free movement.  They are lightweight and have a silky feel to them. For reference I am 5'4 and about 145lbs. I usually wear medium but bought large in case they shrink in wash. 3 pack of varying colors for 30 bucks- great find. Will buy more!
So comfortable, and feel good on the skin.  The material is that really cool silky cotton feel, that looks and feels expensive and not cheap or shiny.  Love it, will be buying more!

These are super cute. They’re my favorite length and very flowy. I would say they run a little bit large, but I think that’s by design. The armpit hole is also a bit wider than some other brands. I, personally, don’t mind it. The only reason they lost one star for me is because of the material. It feels really nice, but even the tiniest drop of water or sweat leaves a visible stain. They show everything while working out. Once they’re washed and dried, the stain is gone again. They also tend to wrinkle really easily and you can’t use a little water or steam to get wrinkles out because… that leaves a water stain. It’s just an odd material choice. I’d still repurchase, it’s just something to know.
Love this, great price. Happy with purchase for workout shirt (brown color)

评论概述: Cute cut, shows every speck of moisture
评论详情: I like the way the shirt hangs. It's sporty, comfortable, and cute. However! If you're someone who sweats or gets any moisture on your shirt ever, be warned. It will not come out until you wash it. Every spec of moisture, sweat, etc shows itself for-ev-er. It won't dry in a way where you can't see it. This is what it looks like just from water and sweat after an afternoon of doing my every day life. And while I'm probably more messy than most while working in the garden, I'd expect my sweat to dry down so you can't see it 6 hours later.

This top is really cute! Fabric is not cotton-like, more like nylon/polyester so no pilling and no attracting lint. The fit is so cute, loose but not drapey and the perfect length. It hits me just below the waistband on my shorts. The arm holes are a little open, as pictured in the listing, but I just wear a sports bra underneath for an accent color. I want to buy more of these!
So comfy! Perfect length for a cropped top, and I am 5'9" 155 lbs. I got the size large. They do show sweat stains pretty bad though. However, people sweat, it is what it is, will buy again!

评论概述: The reviews about length were right, still like it
评论详情: I read reviews warning about length and read the dimensions, but still wanted to try it. It was even shorter than I imagined, but honestly still a comfortable shirt and feels well made for the price. I'll likely just keep it for lounging but won't use it for exercise. The fabric is very soft and it feels great to wear, I just wish it was a solid foot longer. I've found similar shirts but hope they'll be comparable fabric wise. If you don't mind showing off stomach it might just be for you!
Super cute and love the loose fit! The longer cropped shirt is the perfect length for.
Fit was great and comes in a variety of colors.  Gives you some modesty whether your at the gym or for just running errands.
So soft and comfortable.

评论概述: Comfy & Cute — color is not as pictured — but still pleased
评论详情: Soft, comfy material — could be used as a workout tank or casual. It’s kinda that material where you don’t want to handle anything oily with it on because it would easily get on it. I’m not complaining though - just informing others, I really do like it and will probably order at least one more!

I’ve bought several 3 packs now and love them all. The ivory color is closer to pale yellow but most importantly the fit and length are perfect. I play tennis and do not want to show my midriff and these tops are the perfect length for that. Flattering, and flowy without being too oversized.

类型: Size: LargeColor: Crepe Pink+dark Blue+dark Grey (Long)
评论详情: They're fine. They get the job done. The material picks up moisture really easily, so I feel like I'm always walking around with water spots or stains when I wear these. Which is great for a workout top.

The fabric is comfortable, the fit is loose. I ordered the "long", but it'd be better described as "not cropped". It's still relatively short and not nearly as long as I'd have expected, doesn't even hit my hip bones. If you're looking for a long tank, this is not it. I prefer long tanks, but plan to keep these simply because of the comfort and price point.  As others mentioned, when you sweat and it starts to dry, the fabric has a stained look to it. Doesn't bother me because I only wear them for working out or working around the house.  Not my favorite, but for the cost they're worth it
La tela es buenisima, súper suave y cómoda, me encantó que es ancha en mangas y de largo, dando soltura en movimientos
I love this new workout shirts!

The fabric is soft, light/airy and dries pretty quick. The reason I gave it 4 starts is because if you sweat a lot it shows a lot and I wore the pink one and it looked like dried blood when it got wet with my sweat. It was very embarrassing but I'd wear these for light exercise in the summer
Buy these immediately and don’t look back. The best quality and fit, plus very good fabric, flattering. I’m getting more!

These shirts are very soft. I love working out with these shirts. They breath great and don’t get in the way when weight lifting

评论概述: Literally wear these almost every day!

Amazing and cute!
I love how this workout tank fits! Hits perfectly at the hips, buttery soft, and very flattering.

评论用户: Absolutely love these tops. So much I’m going to buy another 3. Such nice fabric. Great for the gym and super comfy as lounge wear.
评论详情: Love this product! Great quality fabric; perfect for the gym and lounge wear. Super soft material that washes well. Love it so much I’m going to buy another 3.

I love these shirts for work! I have the blue and the salmon color (definitely not indian red) both are mediums. My blue is a tad bigger which was perfect on me, wish they both fit the same but I still love them. I'm a 38D 5'1 and 145lbs, got the long lengths and I wear a long sports bra with them. So soft!

I work with horses everyday out in the heat.  This fabric is great, the sizing is right on- not too short!  They are such a good price point I'm going to order more now that I know how much I love them!

These tank tops are cute however because of the type of fabric, they are easily soil. for example, if you apply lotion to your body, it will stain the top.  any type of hair product that you have before putting it on or taking it off will stain the top.  they stain easily. I actually washed this top three times and dried it before going out and wearing it on an occasion.

These are so perfect for working out. I bought two different sets for summertime, and they were perfect. Even in the warmest weather they have a super breathable material. Some seemed a little short on me, but I also have a larger bust so maybe keep that in consideration if you buy. Otherwise they’re great!

I like wearing these to the gym because they are long enough to cover the waistband of my yoga pants.  The material is soft, launders well.  I washed in cold water and dried on low being unfamiliar with the material.  I ordered in the size Amazon recommended and they fit perfectly!  They are slightly loose, which I like.  I will definitely order in more colors and highly recommend!
Fits as expected. Perfect for working out

评论概述: Wish it came in an XS!
评论详情: Pros: Fabric seems high quality, soft and well-finished. The crop length suits my petite form without looking silly, a fine length for high waisted leggings or jeans. The colors (rose, green, tan set) are pleasant neutrals for the gym and athleisure-wear.  Cons: The smallest size is too big! It’s not egregiously huge, but on me the deep arm holes combined with the extra fabric look strange (5’1” ~108 lbs). I intended them for HIIT classes, paired with leggings and a long line sports bra. I think the dimensions are simply too exaggerated for my size and would be distracted by extra fabric swishing around during a workout. Hopefully Ododos released an XS!
Absorbing, lightweight. Good quality
Love them fit awesome
For reference I have a short torso. I am a 36 C ( in a short bra in this picture ). I am 5’3. 170 pounds. I got a medium it fit exactly as I expected! Material is nice. Excited to wear at the gym.

Dull colors - wish there were happier choices. I don’t like them because of this but there’s nothing cooler to wear over my sports bras. They're basically shapeless and unflattering from the front, but they flash a colorful sports bra. Whiler my trainer gets glimpses of the back muscles I’m using (good) I don’t feel naked (great)!
I love these tops! Feel like butter! Flowy and flattering!
I have this is 2 colors. Absolutely love. Perfect for working out or even just a casual every day look. I wish the cropped came in some of the softer colors!

I am typically a medium and I ordered the medium long. I am 5'1 and the cut is perfect on me right to the top of my hip. The quality and material is amazing. I wear mine as a workout shirt and it's so comfortable. The armpits are a little long but I don't mind with a sports bra, it doesn't matter. I am about to order another set of 3 in different colors.

评论概述: Great tanks. Colors not as shown though so be aware.

The colors do not match the colors in the image, however. I've attached photos for reference. The steel looks greenish in the photo but is definitely just grey. The teal is actually a deep blue. And the Indian red is more like a dusty rose.
The fabric is very soft. Don’t like the larger arm holes and it’s not long enough for me.

评论概述: Perfect for working out or jeans!

I ordered a three-pack of the longer-fit tanks in a small and they fit perfectly - flowy and loose. I would say they run a little on the big side. The hem sits at just above my hip. The material is soft. I'd buy again!
Love the fit and the quality.

评论概述: Good value, good fit, good sizing - not quite opaque.
评论详情: I wish these were opaque, even if it meant they were a few extra dollars as a result. The fit, sizing, and colors are otherwise great! If you don't mind a *bit* of sheer, then I think these are worth it. I am going to keep and wear them with sports bras as normal!

类型: Size: SmallColor: Crepe Pink+dark Blue+dark Grey (Long)
评论详情: I really like these shirts for working out. I love the fit - high neck, very loose armpits, and they're not too short in the torso. The material is interesting, not like a cotton and also not like spandex- they kind of have a cooling sensation. I find these to be comfortable and flattering.
I love this product! It’s very soft and quality material that can be compared to my brand name gym clothes. The fitting is on point! I’d buy this again.
Fits true to size. Soft material. Comfortable for working out.
I used to love these shirts for working out but now they are much shorter and wider than they used to be so I’m having to return them. I ordered size small.
I absolutely love these tops! I wish I could get some pastel colors in my size Medium. I've bought two different color packets of 3. They all have washed up very well

I bought these shirts to have a loose fitting option for my growing maternity belly. I got a size medium but could have probably gone with a small. They are comfortable and fit as expected. They don’t move around too much while exercising and are cool over the hot summer months in Colorado.
I love these tanks for the gym and working out. I loved the first set so much that I wanted more colors but the wrong colors were sent.

Super comfy and flowy, and a good length too, it's not cropped but also not super long. I wish the armpits were a little bit higher up but it's not a big deal to me

These are exactly what I wanted. The armhole cut isn't too deep like other styles. Material feels nice and kind of suede-like? Very nice drape. Hits at a reasonable length, not too cropped or too long. Love them for my pilates workouts.

These run true to size and are very comfortable!  I will probably order another set
I do love these under a to that is too low. Only problem,  the loose bottom may rise up depending on what it's paired with.

These shirts are pretty much my new favorites. Although I originally got them as cute workout shirts to help motivate me, but they're so comfortable to lounge around in and still look nice enough to wear when I'm out and about. Definitely plan on getting more soon!

These are my absolute favorite workout tops. They are full length tank tops and perfect for exercising. I have bought multiple packs of these shirts. This is all I want to work out in. I highly recommend these. They aren’t right fitting tank tops, which I love. I don’t like tight fitting shirts, these shirts are perfect and loose!

These are perfect. The cut is flattering and forgiving as far as the size is concerned. I’m high waisted with wide hips (37,33,43, 165lbs) and the L was great. The material is light and flowy and I love how low cut the underarm is to show off cute colored sports bras

I needed some workout shirts for the gym during the summer and these were perfect for the hot weather, soft yet lightweight. They are not super cropped but not long either which is exactly what I wanted!

These are super soft and comfortable, and I love them. The one downside is they stain so easily. I don’t know what it is about the fabric that holds stains. Spray and Wash sometimes get the stains out but not all the time.
Soft, light weight, and the perfect fit! It feels high quality and it has the perfect flow to it.
This is a very lightweight shirt that can be thrown on over sports bra at the gym. It does what it says it does.
Cute and soft. I love them!

These are awesome and much different than I expected The material surprised me - very elevated, haven't seen a workout top in the same material before.  Very comfortable, soft, non-pilling, and it drapes very well.  Highly recommend, I'm buying more.
I bought these for yoga and they’re perfect. They fit well and loose in the right areas. They’re flattering for anyone.
So comfortable and have held up great after tons of washes. I want every color now
The shirts are super soft and stretchy, however even the uncropped style are extremely short.
Cute and comfy bit cut short and cropped in front which makes working out in them uncomfortable

I ordered 4 tank tops before I landed on these. They fit great, crop at just the right place, are lose and conservative, but have the deep arm I like to stay cool with a sports bra beneath.  Fantastic flattering fabric.  32a, 25 in waist, ordered small.
It fits so well and is so soft. I love how flowy and comfortable it is. I bought more and wear them even when I’m not working out.
These tanks are soft, drape nicely and look great with the Ododos leggings. They're all I wear for working out.

These are so cute and comfortable, the material is a really nice quality for the price too. They will get a little wrinkly sometimes but that feels like a pretty minor problem for gym clothes.

类型: Size: MediumColor: Crepe Pink+dark Blue+dark Grey (Long)
评论详情: I ordered one of these on a whim for a beach trip, it was cheap and would get here in time.  I wasn't expecting much, but it's honestly become one of my favorite tops for hot days or working out.  The material is so soft and not clingy.  The arm holes are longer so I do have to wear a 'longline' sports bra to keep covered but I don't mind that.  As others mentioned, if you're a heavy sweater, you may want to skip if you hate visible sweat marks, but that doesn't bother me...kind of the point when wearing it for a workout?  Could easily be dressed up as well with the right outfit/accessories because the material is that nice and flows well.  I'm usually a medium and ordered medium.  I probably could have done a small but like my tops on the looser side so I'm happy with how they fit.
